resources.string:
Hello,

I use %1$s, the secure instant messenger that protects users’ privacy.

My ${app_name_short} ID: https://threema.id/%2$s

Let’s communicate via %1$s!

Cheers,
Hi! Let’s use %1$s to communicate in a safe and privacy-compliant way! My ${app_name_short} ID: https://threema.id/%2$s
${app_name_short}. The secure messenger that protects our privacy
Keep %s users in sync with your device’s address book
Do not sync %s users with your device’s address book
Anybody can send you a message. New contacts will be added automatically when the first message arrives.
Only people on your contact list can send you a message.
Use color LED (if available) for incoming messages
Enter key adds a new line
Do not play any in-app sounds
Do not vibrate when receiving messages
Use ${app_name_short} Push to be notified about new messages
Check for new messages using system push service
Events and network information will be logged to the file debug_log.txt
Re-register the device for push notifications with FCM/HMS

We are about to send an SMS to:

%1$s

Is this number correct?
Linking phone number to your ID
The public key that you have scanned does not match the key that the server has stored for this ID. This means that somebody has manipulated the scanned code, and that the key should not be trusted.
The ID has been successfully scanned and the contact is now verified.
This ID has already been scanned and verified.
Your ${app_name_short} ID is already linked to this mobile number
Your ${app_name_short} ID is already linked to this email address
Do you really want to delete this contact and all associated messages?
Your mobile number has been successfully verified.
Verifying your mobile number failed. Please make sure the number you entered is correct and you are connected to your mobile network before trying again.
Verifying your mobile number failed. The verification process has been aborted.

Unless you have created a backup or exported and saved a copy of this ID, you will never be able to send or receive messages with this ID again.\n\nIf you don’t want to use this ID anymore, it is recommended to set a revocation password and revoke the ID on myid.threema.ch/revoke before deleting it.
Last warning: do you really want to delete your ID on this device?
Permanently delete your ${app_name_short}-ID and all data on this device
Your ID export will be encrypted with a password. Use a combination of letters, numbers and symbols. Do not forget what you enter here!

The text string displayed above or the QR code, along with the password that you have chosen, can be used to restore your ID on another device. You should copy it to a suitable place, share it by email or scan the QR code using another device.
The following text string can be used together with the chosen password to restore your ${app_name_short} ID.
Tap here to enter your passphrase
Set a passphrase to protect your master key. Note that you will have to enter it each time the app restarts.
The master key is still locked. Would you like to try again?
Enter or paste the text string of the ID export to restore
You don’t have any contacts yet. Turn on synchronization (Settings > Privacy), or add contacts manually.
You don’t have any contacts yet. Synchronization is on, but it looks like none of your address book contacts are on ${app_name_short} (invite them!).
Your master key is protected by a passphrase. Enter your passphrase to unlock the key.

If you proceed, we will attempt to call you immediately. Your verification code will be read to you twice. Note that we will only make one attempt, so please be sure that you are ready before you continue.
Please enter the code from the verification SMS or mentioned in the phone call.
The code you entered is not valid.
This code has expired. Please scan it again directly from the other user’s app.
No connection to the internet, invalid ID export data or incorrect password
Selected file is not an image
Connection error, please try again later.
Selected file is not a video
File is larger than the maximum of %1$d MB
Please enter your shop license key. You can purchase a license or retrieve your keys in case you already purchased a license previously.
Please enter the ${app_name_short} credentials provided by your company.
The license key is invalid. Would you like to try again or quit ${app_name}?
License is invalid. Would you like to try again or quit ${app_name}?
A new version is available. Would you like to download it now?
The push token has been reset
Touch to fetch and view new incoming messages.
New messages do not trigger a notification when the master key is locked
New messages trigger a generic notification when the master key is locked
Your data will be saved in a ZIP file on your internal USB storage and can be restored on any Android device. Please enter a password to protect your data backup with.
Enter the password that you used to create this backup.
Include large media files (video, documents, original pictures)
Time until the screen lock is activated
PIN set. Tap here to change
Protect your privacy by setting a numeric PIN (digits only). This PIN can be used to lock access to the app’s UI after a grace time or to protect private chats
Need to select at least one member to continue
You may not select more than %1$d group members
Do you really want to leave this group?
“%1$s” has been removed from the group.
You cannot send a message to an empty group
You are not a member of this group
The contact is still a member or creator of a group conversation and therefore cannot be deleted. Leave or delete all groups that include this contact and try again.
The IDs listed here will be ignored when synchronizing contacts
Messages from IDs listed here will be ignored.
This contact is linked to a record in your phone’s addressbook. If you delete it in ${app_name_short} it will reappear after a contact sync.\nWould you like to exclude it from synchronization?
Set the sorting order of entries in the contact list
Display multi-color placeholders if contact picture is missing
Use gray placeholders if contact picture is missing
Show all ${app_name_short} IDs in your contact list
Do you really want to unlink this contact?
The keyboard covers the application if your device is in landscape mode
Display a preview of the chat above the keyboard if there’s room
Failed to update push token, please try again later.
Save incoming pictures and videos as well as outgoing camera pictures in unencrypted form
Do you really want to remove this list and delete its messages?
Choose a name for this list
We could not find a push service on your device because Google Play Services are not installed or outdated.
%s will try to open a persistent background connection to the server. This may not work reliably if your device’s battery optimization mechanisms interfere with the background connection.
Internal contact, prepopulated by your organization.
Internal contact whose identity and public key you have personally verified by scanning their QR code.
Contact whose identity and public key you have personally verified by scanning their QR code.
Contact whose phone number and/or email address is contained in your address book.
Unknown contact; either this contact did not link a phone number nor an email address to their ID, or your address book does not contain these contact details.
Do not show thumbnails in app switcher and disable screenshots of select screens
Could not open media file. It was deleted or not downloaded from the server.
No %s were found in this chat.
Do you really want to delete %d media messages?

${app_name} keeps the passphrase in memory. If you need to re-enter the passphrase often, make sure that task killer and battery saver apps that may terminate ${app_name_short} prematurely, are disabled.
This ID is already in your contact list
A modern ZIP tool with AES support is needed in order to unzip the file, e.g. http://www.7-zip.org or https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-unarchiver/id425424353
The chat will be sent as an encrypted zip file. Please choose a password:
Need to define at least two choices
Poll closed. Tap to view results
Quickly create an online poll directly with ${app_name_short}. Schedule an event, create a survey or ask your contacts anything you want.
You cannot send messages to a blocked contact
Some of the recipients cannot be selected.
Future messages from this contact will be discarded. Continue?
You cannot send messages to an invalid contact
Please enter at least two answers for a poll.
Warning: %1$s will not be able to participate in your poll.
Warning: %1$d contacts will not be able to participate in your poll.

If you continue, “${app_name_short} Push” will be used instead of the system’s push service. This helps reducing your digital footprint but requires that your phone is configured in a way to allow the app to run in the background. You may want to contact your device manufacturer’s support for assistance with the configuration if the corresponding options cannot be found in the device settings.
If you haven’t already done so, save your ID export text string or the corresponding QR code to a safe place or print it. Your ${app_name_short} ID cannot be restored without a backup.
Do you really want to remove all wallpapers?
The password you enter here allows you to revoke your ID at https://myid.threema.ch/revoke in case you lose it or it gets stolen
No unread messages or PIN lock activated
This item has already been added.
No app found to open this file.
Warning: %1$d contacts cannot receive your file.

Transferring uncompressed files and images can cause substantial data usage that may lead to additional charges by your mobile provider. We recommend to upload and download files in WiFi networks only.
Require a passphrase to unlock local encryption
Delete media and files older than:

If you run out of free space, you can delete older encrypted media files to make room. Thumbnails will still be kept. Note that this is not an automatic process. Unless you hit one of the buttons below, nothing will be deleted.
If you continue, the files will be deleted and only thumbnails will be kept.
Clean up media, files and messages
If you continue, the messages will be permanently deleted. You will not be able to recover them.
You can also remove older messages completely.
Note: The system’s character set may not be able to display all emojis supported by ${app_name_short}.
The ID that you have scanned does not match the contact that you have stored.
Would you like to save changes to group?
No map application found on this device
Send Logfile to ${company_name} for further analysis in case of problems
To save or send media, allow ${app_name} permission to access storage.
To send a location, allow ${app_name} permission to access your position.
To send contacts, allow ${app_name} permission to read contacts.
Too many incorrect attempts. Try again in %s seconds.
Move your finger on the screen to generate a new ${app_name_short} ID.
Your ${app_name_short} ID works just like a phone number.\nYour contacts can reach you through this ID.
Your contacts will see your nickname in their notifications
Link your mobile number and/or your email to your ${app_name_short} ID.
Link your mobile number to your ${app_name_short} ID.
A stable Internet connection is required to create your unique ${app_name_short} ID. Please try again.
Do you want to use your ${app_name_short} ID as your nickname?
Either the phone number or the email address you entered are not valid.\nPlease correct before proceeding.
The phone number you entered is not valid.\nPlease correct before proceeding.

By moving your finger, you create random data (called entropy) that is used to generate the keypair associated with your new unique ${app_name_short} ID. The keypair consists of a public key that is distributed to your contacts and a private key that is safely stored on your phone. Your contacts will encrypt messages to you with your public key. Only the owner of the private key and nobody else is able to decrypt these messages.
You also created a key pair. The public key has been securely transmitted to our servers. The private key never leaves your device. This ensures that nobody else can read your messages.

If you enable this option, ${app_name_short} one-way encrypts (hashes) email addresses and phone numbers before sending them to the server to look for matching contacts. We do not store any addressbook data.

Contact sync can help you find your contacts automatically. If you agree, phone numbers and email addresses from your phone book will be encrypted before being sent to our server to look for matching contacts. Absolutely no data will be stored or shared.\n\nWould you like to enable contact sync?

By providing your phone number and email address, ${app_name_short} can help your contacts find you automatically if they have you in their phone’s address book. The data will be stored in a one-way encrypted (hashed) form on our server. You can simply skip this step, if you would like to use ${app_name} completely anonymously.

By providing your phone number, ${app_name_short} can help your contacts find you automatically if they have you in their phone’s address book. The number will be stored in a one-way encrypted (hashed) form on our server. You can simply skip this step, if you would like to use ${app_name_short} completely anonymously.

The nickname is used in push notifications on some devices or as an additional means of identifying you to users who do not yet have you in their address book. We recommend providing only your first name or a pseudonym. If you don’t set a nickname, we’ll use your ${app_name_short} ID by default.
Your mobile number is not yet verified.
Do you really want to abort the mobile number verification?
Poll “%1$s” has received a new vote
You have entered neither a mobile number nor an email address to link to your ${app_name_short} ID. You will not appear on contact lists. Do you really want to use ${app_name} anonymously?

You have not entered a phone number or an email address to link to your ${app_name_short} ID. You will therefore not automatically be added to contact lists. Do you really want to use ${app_name} anonymously?
Or scan the QR code of your ID export
Some files could not be saved
Please wait for at least 10 minutes for the SMS to arrive before requesting a call.
You are the administrator of this group. If you leave it now, it will become orphaned. The other members will still be able to chat but changes will no longer be possible.
Do you really want to delete this group completely? All messages will be removed and remaining members can no longer use the group.
Not enough memory to complete this action
Some settings have been disabled by the administrator
This will create a clone of this group with you as the administrator. Continue?
Use earpiece for voice message playback if proximity sensor is covered
No media found in this chat matching the selection.
Max. %d items can be edited at once
Do you want to mark this chat as private? Use the menu to toggle visibility of private chats in the message list.

${app_name_short} allows you to protect certain chats with a PIN and temporarily hide them from your message list. To enable private chats, please set a PIN or enable System Screen Lock (Android 6.0+) in settings.
Access protection cannot be removed as there is at least one private chat.
Display a list of recently added images in the attachments popup
Display recent chats when sharing from other apps
Please connect your device to the charger and disable all energy saving options to prevent your device from interrupting the backup or restore process.
Really reset notification sound settings to defaults?
Notification sound settings have been reset.
Threema Channel provides you with news about all things Threema. Would you like to subscribe to Threema Channel and add it to your contacts? It’s free and you can unsubscribe at any time.
Hold on. The app will be restarted in a few seconds.
Battery optimization prevents %1$s from working correctly when your phone falls into sleep mode. Please disable battery optimization for %2$s.
Select “All Apps” in the drop down menu
Search for %s in the list and deactivate the optimization
Do you really want to keep battery optimization switched on for %1$s? %2$s will not work correctly.
If you switch or lose your device, nobody can restore your ${app_name_short} ID or your chats if you don’t have a backup. Please save your data using the appropriate backup options.

Data backups contain:

● Your ID and your key pair
● Contacts and trust levels
● Group memberships
● Chats
● Media and files (optional)

Data will be saved to an encrypted ZIP file. It is recommended to move the file away from the device after the backup has completed successfully.
Would you like to discard changes?
Allow IPv6 for ${app_name_short} calls and the desktop app / web client.
Disallow IPv6 for ${app_name_short} calls and the desktop app / web client
To apply this setting, the app needs to restart.
Who can see your profile picture?
Hide profile pictures provided by your contacts
Show profile pictures provided by your contacts
The contacts selected in this list will receive your profile picture when you send them a message.

Saving large media files to a local ZIP backup may exceed the CPU and memory capacity of your device and can take a very long time. ${app_name} will not send or receive messages while the backup is running. Continue anyway?
Unable to launch ${app_name}. Please turn your device off, then on again.
Establish a direct connection, if possible, and only relay calls to unverified contacts through ${company_name} servers. May expose your IP address.
Force relaying all calls through ${company_name} servers, protecting your IP address. May affect call quality.
To make encrypted calls and send voice messages, please allow access to the microphone.
Allow permission to manage phone calls while using ${app_name} Call
Notifications for ${app_name} have been disabled in the system settings. You will not be notified about new messages.
Allow ${app_name} to run in the background so it can receive messages even when it’s not active.
In the following screen, make sure, “%s” is protected or excluded from any power management restrictions of your phone. Tap the “back” button when you’re done.
In the following screen, make sure “%s” is included in the list of apps that can autostart. Tap the “back” button when you’re done.
Location services are disabled. Would you like to enable them now?
Please let us know what we can do to improve (optional).
Would you like to rate us on Google Play as well?
Could not send your review to the server. Please make sure you’re connected to the internet before trying again.
Notification when Web/Desktop session is active
${app_name} protects your privacy more rigorously than any other messenger. Find out more in our %1$s.
To use %s, please accept the Privacy Policy.\n\n(Requirement as per EU regulation 2016/679)
Disable data collection for personalized suggestions (if supported by keyboard)
Type the @ character on the keyboard to directly address or mention a member of this group.
Get creative! Tap on the magic wand button to scribble or to add stickers and text to your pictures before sending.

All you need to chat is stored only on your device. You don’t have an account with us and we cannot help you out if you lose your phone or accidentally delete your data.\n\n${app_name_short} Safe creates automatic backups of all the important data, including your keys, your contact list and your group memberships (but no message content), anonymously on a secure server of your choice.

Do you want to continue without enabling ${app_name_short} Safe? When using ${app_name_short} Safe, you can restore your ${app_name_short} ID, contacts and groups in case you lose access to your device.
Please choose a strong password. You will need this password to restore your ${app_name_short} Safe backup.
You can use ${company_name}’s server or specify a third party backup server to use instead.
Save your ${app_name_short} Safe backup on your organization’s server, or specify a different backup server.
Please enter the ${app_name_short} ID you would like to recover
Please enter the mobile number or the email address linked to your ${app_name_short}-ID
No backup found on the server. Check ID and password.
Multiple ${app_name_short} IDs found. Please select the ID to use:
Enable ${app_name_short} Safe to create automatic secure and anonymous backups of all your important data.
Please set a strong password to secure your ${app_name_short} ID with ${app_name_short} Safe. Don’t forget what you enter here!
If you disable ${app_name_short} Safe, any existing backups will be deleted on the server. Continue?
Would you like to add the new contact “%1$s” to your contact list?
To receive messages when ${app_name} is in the background please enable both Background data and Unrestricted data usage
The version of this backup is higher than the supported version. Please update to the latest version of this app.
${app_name_short} Safe backup failed for %d consecutive days. Tap here to check.
Backup or restore in progress. Check notification for status information.
Please make sure ${app_name} is online before closing a poll.
All messages in this chat will be deleted. Continue?
All messages in this chat will be deleted and the chat will be removed. Continue?
Do you want to leave this group and delete it completely? All messages will be removed.
Do you really want to delete this group? All messages will be removed.
Tap here to share or print your encrypted ${app_name_short} ID now
The selected password for ${app_name_short} Safe is not secure and can be easily guessed by attackers. Please choose another one. Hint: Use a password composed of multiple individual words.
The ${app_name_short} Safe password has been updated.
The push token has been cleared
The poll title cannot be empty
This chat is marked as a private chat. To enter it, please set up access protection first.
Important notice about notifications on MIUI

MIUI 10 disables sound and lights for all newly created notification channels by default (except for some apps deemed “important” by Xiaomi). You will have to explicitly enable them for each channel in your phone’s app-specific notification settings screen. Contact your phone’s manufacturer for more information.

MIUI disables sound, lights and floating notifications for all apps by default (except for some very popular apps deemed “important” by Xiaomi). You will have to manually enable these settings in your phone’s app-specific notification settings screen and repeat this procedure after each app update. Contact Xiaomi for more information.
Your administrator enabled ${app_name_short} Safe for your device.
The app is locked. Cannot send.
For privacy reasons, thumbnails and screenshots are always prevented when "App lock" is enabled in security settings
Database migration failed: Not enough space left on device.

The hostname of the link you’re about to open is suspicious:

Displayed Hostname: %s
Real hostname: %s

This could be an attempt to trick you into opening a site pretending to be something else.

Would you like to continue anyway?
To scan QR codes, ${app_name} needs access to the camera
To take a picture, please allow access to the camera
Enter at least two characters to search in messages
Create a data backup to save all your data, including chats and media.
No archived chats.\nTo archive a chat, swipe it to the left in the messages list
Please enter the ${app_name_short} ID of the contact you would like to add
%1$s joined ${app_name_short}. Tap here to send a message.
%1$d contacts joined ${app_name_short}: %2$s. Tap here to send them a message.

You can now link your Android device to the new desktop app (beta) and test the multi-device feature.

For more details, navigate to “Menu > Threema 2.0 for Desktop (Beta)”.
Cannot write to this directory. Please choose another one.
Show badges in bottom navigation tabs
Certificate Pinning Failure. Please check if “Entrust Root Certification Authority - G2” is installed and activated in the credentials storage of your device.
Certificate Pinning Failure. Possible Man-in-the-middle attack. If you have an ad blocker, content filter, or firewall app installed such as “AdGuard”, please disable it for ${app_name}.
Services not installed. Cannot switch to Google FCM or HMS push.
Please enter at least three characters to search for a place.
No matching places found. Please modify your query.
The password does not comply with the guidelines set by the administrator.
Audio has been muted temporarily due to focus loss

To restore a data backup, first delete your ${app_name_short} ID from the “My Profile” screen.\n\nWhen the app restarts, choose “Restore from backup”, “Other restore options”, “Data Backup” and then select the data backup file you want to restore.
Call disconnected due to complete audio focus loss.
Tap for picture, hold for video
To record a video, please allow access to the microphone
Videos and files larger than %s will always be downloaded on demand
Quoted message is no longer available
Disable notifications and reject calls outside of working hours
Remember what you enter here! Since %s does not save any passwords on servers, we cannot help you out, if you forget your PIN or password.
Tap on the system notification shown to restart the app now. If you cannot see the notification, please swipe down your phone’s notification bar.
Picture in Picture mode is disabled for %s. Please enable it in system settings.
Tap here to turn on the camera
The actual image quality depends on the network and the settings of the person you are talking to
For video calling, please allow access to the camera
Tap here to turn on speakerphone
Many thanks to our volunteer translators:\n%s
Do you really want to delete this poll? You will not be able to recover the votes.
The other party started a video call. Tap here to turn on your camera as well.
The other party does not use a current app version or doesn’t allow video calls.
No biometrics are enrolled in the system.
Biometrics are not available on this system.
Missing permission to access biometrics data or hardware.
The dots are an indicator for a contact’s verification level.
Inhibit Smart Replies in Android notifications

The hostname of the link you’re about to open is suspicious.

This could be an attempt to trick you into opening a site pretending to be something else.

Would you like to continue anyway?
An error occurred sending one or more messages.
No more than %d objects can be sent at once.
Error. Media thumbnail could not be loaded
Only images or videos can be selected
No media found on this device
The original file is no longer accessible. Please re-send the message.
Tap here to adjust image resolution.
Are you sure you want to create an empty group?
Find faces in the image and have them blurred or covered with a smiley.
Audio could not be transcoded due to missing system support.
Very large videos may be compressed regardless of this setting.
*You’re the only member of this group*\nUse this chat as a secure notebook for text, media or documents.
*You’re no longer alone in this chat*\nNew messages will be sent to all group members.
Hint: If you don’t add any group members, messages to this group will stay local. That’s ideal for securely storing notes, media or documents or transferring them to the desktop.
The app store was unable to validate your purchase. If you use Google Play, please clear the data of the Google Play Store App and reboot your device.
In the following screen please select the folder where data backups should be saved.
Write a short message to the group admin %1$s why you want to join %2$s.
You already have an open group request for %s through this link and an answer from the group admin is pending. Click on the request in the list if you want to try to resend.
You are about to send a group request for %1$s to admin %2$s. If this link was not invalidated, you will be added automatically to the group as soon as the admin’s device receives your request.
Your group request for %s was accepted
Your group request for %s was rejected because the group is full
Your group request for %s was rejected
Group request message cannot be empty
No sent group requests. Requests can be sent trough group links created by the group admin.
Share this group link with people you would like to join the group: %s.
This link was already configured and shared previously, changing this property is now impossible. Generate a new link with the property you need.
No group links. To create a group link, click on the add button on the bottom right or activate the default link in the group detail view.
No incoming group requests. These can be sent to you through group links which you can administer in the group detail view if you are the admin.
Sent through open link… no message

The server has detected two or more connections from different devices with the same ${app_name_short} ID.

It is not possible to use the same ${app_name_short} ID on several devices simultaneously. New messages are only transmitted to the device that last logged in to the server.

If you’re switching to a new device, please uninstall or disable %s on the old device and then reboot the new one.

What kind of backup do you want to restore?

Learn more about backups in ${app_name_short}
Restore your ID, contacts and groups
Join my ${app_name_short} group through the following link!: %s
Share this link with people you would like to join the group. Consider the options below.
If active, you will receive requests within the group chat which you can accept or decline
The link expires after the set date.

Please disable "battery optimization" for %s to perform this task. As Xiaomi does not allow apps to call this settings screen directly, you will have to do this manually in your phone’s settings. Please contact Xiaomi support if you need assistance with disabling battery optimization.
Unable to import backup file. Make sure there’s enough free space on internal memory.
Empty recording or unable to determine length
Reset contact-specific settings for read receipts and typing indicator to default
This is not a ${app_name_short} specific QR-Code. The decoded content is:
Scan the QR code of a contact to verify its identity. To display the code, ask your contact to tap on the profile picture in the upper left corner of the ${app_name_short} home screen.
Enable storage access to see pictures and videos on your device
You have given access to a select number of photos and videos.
Notification channel for received group requests
The previously shared link will be invalid and requests through the old link will automatically be rejected with an expired response.
No votes have been cast so far.
Please allow access to your contacts in order to be able to sync them.
Either this ID doesn’t exist (anymore), or it isn’t compatible with your ID.
Unable to install. Please make sure “Install unknown apps” is enabled for %s.
${app_name_short} Push is active in the background, to notify you about incoming messages and calls.

Apps cannot run in the background without showing a persistent notification. By showing this notification, we can ensure that ${app_name_short} Push will remain active even when you don’t actively use the app.

If you still experience issues with delayed or missing notifications, please adjust your system settings to ensure that the app can be active in the background without any restrictions and all battery savers are disabled.
Persistent notification shown when ${app_name_short} Push is active
Error adding shortcut to launcher screen
Enable “Nearby devices” permission to locate connected Bluetooth headsets
Long tap to select multiple recipients to send the same message to.
Send messages with Perfect Forward Secrecy
Reset Perfect Forward Secrecy for this contact
Only perform this action when instructed to do so by ${company_name}’s support team.
Perfect Forward Secrecy sessions with this contact have been cleared
A message without Perfect Forward Secrecy has been received. Verify that the sender has intentionally disabled Perfect Forward Secrecy.
Perfect Forward Secrecy is disabled for this chat.
Messages with this chat partner are now protected by Perfect Forward Secrecy.
Messages received in this chat are now protected by Perfect Forward Secrecy.
The Perfect Forward Secrecy session was reset. This can happen when the chat partner changes devices or reinstalls the app.
The Perfect Forward Secrecy session with this contact has been reset.
A message was received out of order and could not be decrypted.
One or more messages could not be sent to %1$s.
One or more messages could not be sent to “%1$s.”
One or more messages could not be sent.
The download of the update failed. Please download and install the update from https://shop.threema.ch/download manually.
This chat is from an unknown contact
If you continue, the ID and nickname of this contact will be forwarded to ${company_name} along with your ID. No contents or personal data is being sent. The contact will not be notified about this.
Also block this contact and delete chat
The ID has been reported as sending spam.
An error occurred while reporting spam: %s

There are incompatible MDM parameters set. ${app_name_short} MDM parameter th_contact_sync cannot be set to true if user restriction DISALLOW_MODIFY_ACCOUNTS is set. Please contact your device administrator.
You will not be able to recover the messages.
Groups will be left or dissolved and then deleted.
Search the company directory for any employees who are not yet in your contact list.
Unable to restore the ID. Reason: %s

To prevent that ${app_name_short} calls interrupt regular calls, the Phone permission is needed. If this permission is not given, an incoming ${app_name_short} call will ring even if there is an ongoing regular call.
To check for ongoing calls, grant ${app_name} the Phone permission.
To prevent that ${app_name} gets paused by the system after longer inactivity, please disable the system setting “Remove permissions and free up space”.
To prevent that ${app_name} gets paused by the system after longer inactivity, please disable the system setting “Pause app activity if unused”.
Unable to fetch data from configuration server. Try again later.

A connection from a different device with the same ${app_name_short} ID has been detected. Have you recently used your ${app_name_short} ID on another device?

If you have, you can ignore this message.

If you haven\'t, your private key may be compromised. Please follow our suggestions to protect your device and data before creating a new ID.
Synchronization with the provisioning server failed.
There are no other members in this group that are able to answer group calls
This group does not contain any other members
To perform group calls, you must allow %s to access the microphone under “permissions”.
To perform group calls, you must allow the microphone permission, so that others can hear you.
To perform calls, you must allow the microphone permission, so that others can hear you.
For other participants to see your picture, you must allow %s to access the camera under “permissions”.
To perform group calls, the phone permission is needed to detect when another call interrupts the group call.
To perform ${app_name_short} calls, the phone permission is needed to detect when another call interrupts the ${app_name_short} call.
To perform group calls with a bluetooth headset, you must allow the “nearby devices” permission to detect bluetooth headsets.
To perform ${app_name_short} calls with a bluetooth headset, you must allow the “nearby devices” permission to detect bluetooth headsets.
Tap here to invite all group members to join a call. All group members will receive a notification and can decide whether they want to join the call or not.
Select whether to vibrate when a group call has been started

Perfect Forward Secrecy (PFS) protects a recorded communication from retroactive decryption even if the long-term encryption key is compromised.\n\nThe option can be enabled if the app on both sides supports PFS.
Group call left due to inactivity

Unable to copy the file. Try the following steps:
1. Open the settings app.
2. Go to “Apps” and choose “Special app access”.
3. Tap on “All files access“.
4. Tap on the three dots in the top right corner and choose “Show system“.
5. Tap on “External Storage“ and ensure “Allow access to manage all files“ is granted.
6. Try again restoring the backup.
Perfect Forward Secrecy has been disabled in this conversation because your chat partner’s app version doesn’t support it.
The Perfect Forward Secrecy session was reset due to invalidity.
Your administrator enabled contact synchronization for your device. Therefore the permission to access contacts is required.
Your ${app_name_short} ID has been restored successfully
Did you know that Threema also offers a professional communication solution for businesses? Tap here to learn more about Threema Work.
Press on the play button on the media notification if it is still present, otherwise please open the app to start the playback from the chat.
Please enable the permission in the settings. Select “Permissions” and then allow “%s”.
No starred messages found. To star a message, long tap on it and select the star button.
${app_name} cannot access media files due to a missing permission on a system app. To fix it, make sure, the switch next to “External Storage” is enabled in the screen that follows and restart %1$s.
A managed password for your ${app_name_short} Safe backup has been defined.\n\nWould you like to use this password? When in doubt, please contact your administrator.

A new managed password for your ${app_name_short} Safe backup has been defined.\n\nWould you like to replace the current password with this new, managed one? When in doubt, please contact your administrator.
Do you really want to unstar all messages?
Manage memory and delete messages or media

If set to anything other than “forever”, incoming and outgoing messages will be irrecoverably deleted after the specified amount of time. This includes unread and unsent messages. However, messages in note groups and starred messages will not be deleted. The deletion process is triggered periodically and not necessarily immediately after activation.
Messages will be deleted automatically after %s. Continue?
Value has been set by administrator and cannot be changed.
If you just dissolve the group, nobody can send new messages to the group anymore, and it can no longer be managed. The dissolved group can still be cloned.
*This group is orphaned*\nThe group creator has left the group, and it can no longer be maintained. One of the remaining members can clone the group (via group details) to become the new admin.
This group is orphaned as the group creator has left the group. Please clone this group to become the new admin.
You are no longer part of this group and cannot use it anymore.
This group has been dissolved and cannot be used anymore.
Before linking a new device, please download and open the latest beta version of [${app_name_desktop} for Desktop].
A shortcut for this target already exists.
Scan the QR code displayed in the beta version of ${app_name_desktop} for Desktop on the device you want to link.
Select the same images as shown on the new device to confirm that you trust it.
The new device will store an independent copy of your %s profile, and messages will be sent and received on your behalf.
${app_name} can now be used on the device you just linked (even when this device is turned off or isn\'t connected to the Internet).
This message could not be sent to all members. Resend message to %1$s?
Forgot your credentials? Please contact your ${app_name_short} administrator.
Some system configuration issues possibly prevent %s from working correctly. Please fix these problems by following the instructions below.
The app is not allowed to display full screen notifications. You may miss incoming calls when the device is locked. To fix this, activate “Allow full screen notifications.”
Notifications are completely disabled for this app. You will not be informed of incoming messages or calls, and the app may not work as expected. To fix this, activate “All notifications.”
The app cannot use mobile data when in the background. You will not be informed of incoming messages unless you actively open the app. To fix this, activate “Background data.”
The background usage of the app is restricted. You will not receive any notifications, and many features will not work as expected. To fix this, tap on “App battery usage” and select “Unrestricted.”
The naming of some of the system-setting options mentioned above may vary depending on the Android version and device manufacturer.

The app is not allowed to maintain a permanent connection to the servers which is required for ${app_name_short} Push to work. You will not be informed of new messages when the app is in the background. To fix this, tap on “App battery usage” and select “Unrestricted.”
An active Internet connection is required to check the state of your contacts. Please make sure that you are connected to the Internet and try again.
Cannot edit the message because the recipient’s app version does not support this feature.
The following group members will not be able to see your edits: %1$s
Cannot edit the message because no group member has an app version that supports this feature.
Change sound and vibration in system settings dialog
The message will not be deleted for the following group members: %1$s
Find out more about Threema Work
Please download the regular Threema app if you’re a private user.

For each chat with individual notification settings, a notification channel is created, which means that the name of the chat is visible in the device settings even if the app is locked. Continue anyway?
The device could not be linked. Please try again.\nReason: %s.
An error occurred while scanning the QR code

plurals.name: md_max_device_slots_reached_info
plurals.item: Only one device can be linked at a time.
Maximum number of %d linked devices reached. Remove a linked device to add a new one.

resources.string: The linking is not completed yet. Would you like to cancel it?
Please check the Internet connection and try again.
Select emoji to add from emoji picker
Some won\'t see your reactions due to an old version.
You have received emoji reactions from a contact who has a newer app version. Besides 👍 and 👎, your app version does not yet support sending emoji reactions.
This reaction cannot be displayed. Unknown emoji.
Your app version does not yet support sending emoji reactions.
%1$s is using an app version that does not yet support this feature.
You cannot react to this message with an emoji because no group member has an app version that supports this feature.
%1$s is using an app version that does not yet support removing emoji reactions or sending more than one emoji reaction. You can still replace 👍 with 👎 or vice versa.
None of the group members is using a version of the app that supports removing emoji reactions or sending more than one emoji reaction. You can replace 👍 with 👎 or vice-versa.
Your app version does not yet support removing emoji reactions or sending more than one emoji reaction.
This message has emoji reactions. In the chat, tap and hold any emoji bubble to view them all.
This message has emoji reactions. In the chat, tap and hold any emoji bubble to view them all.
When you link a device, Perfect Forward Secrecy will be disabled for all contacts.\n\nThis is a limitation of the current beta version. For more limitations, please refer to [this FAQ entry].
Tap here to use the next generation of the desktop app with multi-device support.
Please retry linking the device. If this problem persists, please contact support (“Main menu > Help”).
Please retry linking the device. If this problem persists, please contact support (“Main menu > Help”).
Please make sure you’re using the corresponding app from [our website].
Please install the latest version of ${app_name} on both devices.
It seems that there are issues with connecting to the device. Please restart the app on the new device and try again.
Please retry linking the device. If this problem persists, please contact support (“Main menu > Help”).
Please enter at least 3 characters of a name to begin searching in your company\'s directory of ${app_name_short} users.
